linkTitle.card: Encode or decode Base64 strings and files

base64EncoderDecoder.drag_drop_hint: Drag & drop a file here or click to select
base64EncoderDecoder.file_too_large: Error: File size exceeds {maxSize}MB limit. Please choose a smaller file.
base64EncoderDecoder.binary_preview_note: Decoded image preview shown above. Use Download button to save file.
base64EncoderDecoder.binary_file_note: Binary file decoded. Use Download button to save.
base64EncoderDecoder.encode_error: Encoding error. Please verify the text is valid.
base64EncoderDecoder.decode_error: Decoding error. Please verify the Base64 string is valid.
features: Text Encoding: Convert plain text to Base64 format
Text Decoding: Decode Base64 strings back to plain text
File Support: Drag and drop files for encoding/decoding
Live Mode: Real-time encoding/decoding as you type
URL Safe: Option for URL-safe Base64 encoding
Line Processing: Encode/decode multiple lines independently
Statistics: Display of character and line count
how_to_use_steps: Enter text or upload a file via drag and drop
Choose between Encode or Decode
Optionally enable URL-safe encoding or live mode
Copy the result or download as a file
base64EncoderDecoder.notice_content: This tool processes all data exclusively in your browser. No data is transmitted to or stored on external servers. Your privacy is 100% protected.
base64EncoderDecoder.h1_title: Base64 Encoder & Decoder — Fast & Secure Online Tool
base64EncoderDecoder.card_description: Base64 encoder and decoder for text and files with drag & drop support. URL-safe encoding, live preview, and multi-line processing for web development and APIs.
base64EncoderDecoder.tool_description: Base64 is a binary-to-text encoding scheme that represents binary data in ASCII string format. It's commonly used for encoding data in URLs, emails, and data URIs. All encoding and decoding happens locally in your browser for complete privacy.

linkTitle.card: Encode or decode URL parameters and components

urlEncoderDecoder.encode_placeholder: Enter URL or text to encode...
urlEncoderDecoder.component_info: Component mode encodes all special characters including / ? # &
urlEncoderDecoder.uri_info: URI mode preserves URL structure, encodes only special characters
how_to_use_steps: Enter the URL or text you want to encode/decode
Choose the mode: Component mode (encodes all characters) or URI mode (preserves structure)
Click Encode or Decode
Optionally use the URL parser to analyze URL components
urlEncoderDecoder.h1_title: URL Encoder & Decoder — Parse URLs & Query Strings
urlEncoderDecoder.card_description: URL encoder and decoder for query parameters and components. Parse protocol, host, path. Support for encodeURI and encodeURIComponent methods
urlEncoderDecoder.tool_description: Our URL Encoder Decoder allows you to safely encode and decode URLs and their components. The tool supports both component mode (encodeURIComponent) and URI mode (encodeURI) and includes an integrated URL parser for analyzing protocol, host, path, and query parameters. Perfect for web developers working with URL parameters.

linkTitle.card: Format, validate and beautify JSON data

jsonFormatterValidator.drag_drop_hint: Drag & drop a JSON file here or click to select
jsonFormatterValidator.status_initial: Ready to format and validate JSON
jsonFormatterValidator.escape_description: Escape or unescape JSON strings for embedding in code
jsonFormatterValidator.not_escaped_string: Input is not an escaped JSON string
how_to_use_steps: Paste JSON text or upload a JSON file
Click Format for pretty output or Minify for compact version
Optionally choose indentation (2/4 spaces or tab) and enable key sorting
Switch to Tree view for hierarchical display or use the path extractor
jsonFormatterValidator.h1_title: JSON Formatter & Validator — Beautify, Minify & Fix
jsonFormatterValidator.card_description: Format, validate and beautify JSON with syntax highlighting. Minify JSON, view tree structure, and detect errors. in your browser with privacy.
jsonFormatterValidator.tool_description: Format, validate, and beautify your JSON data with our powerful JSON Formatter & Validator. The tool offers automatic error correction, alphabetical key sorting, various indentation options, and an intuitive tree view. Additionally, you can minify JSON, escape strings, and use the integrated path extractor to retrieve specific values. All operations are performed client-side for maximum security.

aspectRatioCalculator.css_padding_info: Classic padding-bottom hack for older browser support

aspectRatioCalculator.h1_title: Aspect Ratio Calculator — Responsive Design Dimensions
aspectRatioCalculator.meta_title: Aspect Ratio Calculator — Responsive Dimensions & CSS
aspectRatioCalculator.card_description: Calculate missing dimensions from aspect ratios. Generate CSS code with modern aspect-ratio property or legacy padding-bottom technique. Includes 16:9, 4:3, 21:9 presets.
aspectRatioCalculator.meta_description: Calculate dimensions from aspect ratios for responsive design. Generate CSS with aspect-ratio property or padding-bottom fallback. Common presets and resolution table included.
aspectRatioCalculator.tool_description: Calculate missing dimensions from aspect ratios with our Aspect Ratio Calculator. Generate CSS code for responsive media with modern aspect-ratio property or legacy padding-bottom technique. Perfect for responsive images, video embeds, and layout design with common presets like 16:9, 4:3, 21:9, and more.

linkTitle.card: Convert pixels to rem units for responsive design

pxToRemConverter.em_relative_hint: em is relative to parent font size
pxToRemConverter.rem_info: rem: Relative to root (html) font size. Best for consistent spacing.
pxToRemConverter.em_info: em: Relative to parent element font size. Can compound when nested.
pxToRemConverter.percent_info: %: Percentage of parent element font size.
pxToRemConverter.tailwind_info: Tailwind CSS: Uses rem units with base 16px (0.25rem = 4px).
how_to_use_steps: Optionally adjust the base font size (default: 16px)
Enter a pixel value or use the quick values
Conversion is automatic to rem, em, and percentage
Use the conversion table for commonly used values
pxToRemConverter.h1_title: Px to Rem Converter — CSS Unit Calculator for Responsive
pxToRemConverter.card_description: Convert pixels to rem units for responsive CSS. PX to REM calculator with custom base font size, batch conversion and live preview for web development.
pxToRemConverter.tool_description: Effortlessly convert between pixel (px), rem, em, and percentage units with our Px to Rem Converter. The tool allows customization of base font size and parent font size for precise calculations and offers quick values as well as a comprehensive conversion table. Ideal for responsive design and especially useful for Tailwind CSS developers working with rem-based spacing systems.

linkTitle.card: Generate unique identifiers in multiple formats

uuidGeneratorTool.version_v4_help: Randomly generated UUID (recommended for most use cases)
uuidGeneratorTool.version_v1_help: Timestamp-based UUID (uses MAC address and current time)
uuidGeneratorTool.version_v7_help: Combines timestamp with random data (recommended for time-ordered UUIDs)
uuidGeneratorTool.bulk_count_help: Generate up to 1000 UUIDs at once
uuidGeneratorTool.bulk_error: Please enter a valid number between 1 and 1000
uuidGeneratorTool.crypto_error: Error: Cryptographically secure random number generation is not available in this browser. UUID generation requires Web Crypto API support.
how_to_use_steps: Choose UUID version (v4 recommended for most cases)
Select the desired format (with/without hyphens, upper/lowercase)
Click 'Generate UUID' for a single UUID
For bulk generation: Enter the quantity (up to 1000) and choose output format
uuidGeneratorTool.h1_title: UUID Generator — Create v1, v4, v7 Unique Identifiers
uuidGeneratorTool.card_description: Generate v1, v4, v7 UUIDs using cryptographically secure random numbers. Bulk generation with format validation and NIL UUID support for databases and APIs.
uuidGeneratorTool.tool_description: Generate universally unique identifiers (UUIDs) in various versions with our UUID Generator. The tool supports version 4 (random), version 1 (time-based), version 7 (time-based + random), and NIL UUIDs. Choose between different output formats such as standard with hyphens, without hyphens, with braces, or in various programming language formats (JavaScript array, JSON, CSV, SQL). Bulk generation allows creating up to 1000 UUIDs at once.

passwordGeneratorTool.h1_title: Secure Password Generator — Create Strong Passwords Fast
passwordGeneratorTool.card_description: Create strong, random passwords with customizable length and character sets. generator with strength meter and multiple password generation.
passwordGeneratorTool.tool_description: Create cryptographically secure passwords with our Password Generator. The tool offers three generation modes: random passwords, memorable passphrases, and pattern-based generation. Choose from various character sets (standard, alphanumeric, hexadecimal, or custom), exclude ambiguous characters, and generate up to 100 passwords simultaneously. The integrated password strength analyzer displays entropy, character set size, and estimated crack time. Export your passwords as TXT, CSV, or JSON.

Select hash algorithm (MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-384, SHA-512)
Optionally enable live mode for real-time hashing
hashGeneratorTool.h1_title: Hash Generator — MD5, SHA-256, SHA-512 & HMAC Online
hashGeneratorTool.card_description: Generate MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-512 hashes for text and files. cryptographic hash generator with HMAC support and file integrity verification
hashGeneratorTool.tool_description: Create cryptographic hash values with our versatile Hash Generator. The tool supports all common hash algorithms: MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-384, and SHA-512. Generate hashes from text or files, create HMAC signatures with custom keys, and generate Subresource Integrity (SRI) hashes for secure CDN integration. Live mode enables real-time hashing during input, and the hash comparison feature helps verify file integrity.

loremIpsumTool.card_description: Generate Lorem Ipsum placeholder text with customizable paragraphs, words, sentences. HTML formatting and list structures for web design mockups and layouts.
loremIpsumTool.tool_description: Generate classic Lorem Ipsum placeholder text for your design mockups and prototypes with our flexible Lorem Ipsum Generator. Choose any number of paragraphs, sentences, or words and combine them as needed. The tool displays the count of generated characters and words and allows quick copying to clipboard. Ideal for web designers, graphic designers, and frontend developers who need realistic text volumes for their layouts.

qrCodeGeneratorTool.card_description: Create custom QR codes. QR code generator supporting URLs, text, WiFi, vCard with SVG/PNG download, color customization and error correction.
qrCodeGeneratorTool.tool_description: Create professional QR codes with our versatile QR Code Generator. The tool supports various QR code types: URLs/links, plain text, contacts (vCard), and WiFi network configurations. Customize foreground and background colors individually and choose between four sizes (200x200 to 512x512 pixels). Generated QR codes can be downloaded as PNG or SVG and are optimized for both digital media and print.

When encoding, select the desired entity type
The result will be displayed automatically
Click 'Character Reference' for a complete list
htmlEntityTool.h1_title: HTML Entity Encoder & Decoder — Convert Special Chars
htmlEntityTool.card_description: Encode and decode HTML entities. Convert special characters to HTML entity codes and vice versa with support for named and numeric entity references.
htmlEntityTool.tool_description: Convert special characters to HTML entities and vice versa with our HTML Entity Encoder. The tool supports three entity formats: named entities like  , decimal numeric entities like  , and hexadecimal entities like  . Choose whether to convert only special characters or all characters to named entities. Auto mode converts instantly as you type. Perfect for web developers who need to safely embed special characters in HTML code.

linkTitle.card: Decode and analyze JSON Web Tokens

jwtDecoderTool.inputPlaceholder: Paste your JWT token here (e.g., eyJhbGci...)...
jwtDecoderTool.signatureNote: The signature can only be verified with the secret key. This tool only decodes the token.
jwtDecoderTool.verificationWarning: ⚠️ Warning: This tool does NOT perform signature verification!
jwtDecoderTool.verificationWarningDetails: This JWT decoder only displays token content. It does NOT verify the signature. Never trust decoded JWT data without server-side verification. An attacker can manipulate the token content – only cryptographic validation with the secret key guarantees authenticity.
how_to_use_steps: Paste your JWT token in the input field
Click 'Decode' or press Ctrl+Enter
View the header, payload, and signature
Check the algorithm and expiration time
Signature is not verified - use a server for that
jwtDecoderTool.h1_title: JWT Decoder — Analyze & Decode JSON Web Tokens Online
jwtDecoderTool.card_description: Decode and analyze JSON Web Tokens (JWT) with detailed header, payload, and signature inspection. Validates JWT structure and provides Base64 decoding insights.
jwtDecoderTool.tool_description: Decode and analyze JSON Web Tokens (JWT) with our JWT Decoder. The tool automatically separates the token into its three parts (header, payload, signature) and displays the decoded content in formatted JSON. Recognizes common algorithms like HS256, RS256, ES256 and shows expiration information (exp, iat, nbf). Note: this tool only decodes tokens; signature verification requires the secret key. All operations are performed locally in your browser.

linkTitle.card: Convert international domain names to Punycode

punycodeConverterTool.inputPlaceholder: Enter domain here (e.g., münchen.de or xn--mnchen-3ya.de)...
how_to_use_steps: Enter an international domain (e.g., münchen.de)
Choose conversion direction or use auto-detection
The result will be displayed automatically
Punycode always starts with 'xn--'
Multiple domains can be entered line by line
punycodeConverterTool.h1_title: Punycode Converter — Convert International Domain Names
punycodeConverterTool.card_description: Convert international domain names to Punycode and back. IDN converter supporting Unicode domains for DNS compatibility and email address encoding.
punycodeConverterTool.tool_description: Convert international domain names (IDN) to and from Punycode with our Punycode Converter. The tool transforms Unicode domains like münchen.de into ASCII-compatible Punycode format (xn--mnchen-3ya.de) and vice versa. Supports all Unicode characters including emojis and special scripts. Auto mode converts instantly as you type. Ideal for web developers and system administrators working with international domains.

linkTitle.card: Escape strings for multiple programming contexts

stringEscaperTool.inputPlaceholder: Enter text to escape or unescape...
stringEscaperTool.h1_title: String Escaper — Escape HTML, JavaScript, JSON & SQL
stringEscaperTool.card_description: Escape and unescape strings for HTML, JavaScript, JSON, SQL, CSV, XML. String escaping tool with syntax highlighting and multi-format conversion for developers.
stringEscaperTool.tool_description: Escape and unescape strings safely for various formats with our String Escaper Tool. The tool supports HTML, XML, JavaScript, JSON, SQL, and CSV and automatically converts special characters into the correct escape sequence for each context. With the auto-processing feature, conversion happens in real-time during input. Character and byte counting helps monitor string length. Ideal for developers working with dynamic data who want to avoid SQL injection, XSS, or other security issues.

codeFormatterTool.card_description: Beautify and format HTML, CSS, JavaScript, XML, SQL code. Supports multiple languages with syntax highlighting and customizable indentation options.
codeFormatterTool.tool_description: Professional code formatter and beautifier for web developers. Format, beautify, and minify HTML, CSS, JavaScript, XML, and SQL code with customizable indentation. The tool provides real-time formatting, syntax validation, and supports both beautification for development and minification for production. Perfect for cleaning up messy code, standardizing formatting, or preparing code for deployment.

dataConverterTool.h1_title: Data Converter — Convert JSON, XML, YAML, CSV & Timestamps
dataConverterTool.card_description: Convert between JSON, XML, YAML, CSV, and TOML formats with syntax validation. Real-time format conversion with error detection and structure preservation.
dataConverterTool.tool_description: Powerful data format converter for web developers. Convert between JSON, XML, YAML, and CSV formats with a single click. Additionally, convert Unix/Epoch timestamps to human-readable dates and vice versa. The tool supports bidirectional conversion, automatic format detection, and customizable output formatting. Perfect for API development, data migration, and working with different data formats.
